thread.title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
thread.title_full: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy

title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
text:
> Entertainment John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy FILE - In this Feb. 22, 2015 file photo, Chrissy Teigen, left, and her husband John Legend arrive at the Oscars in Los Angeles. Teigen and Legend announced on their Instagram accounts, Monday, Oct. 12, that they are expecting their first child. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File)
